name: Empty World (Kordesii)
description:
This game is a game jam entry for minijam 98

In this game you select 1 of 4 playable characters.

Move with W,A,S and D

If you encounter a level you cannot progress, hit the escape key!

Can you find all the barrels? The dungeon is way too crowded with these around! Bonk into them to destroy them. The one with the fastest time wins!

Fullscreen the game in the player, because i didnt figure out yet how to scale the ui elements!
